title: Pocketbase – open-source realtime back end in 1 file
author: modinfo
aiHeadline: Meet Pocketbase, the open-source backend that's so tiny it fits in one file, proving that sometimes less really is more.

title: EU Council Approves New "Chat Control" Mandate Pushing Mass Surveillance
author: fragebogen
aiHeadline: The EU Council just approved a new 'Chat Control' mandate, because nothing says 'we're watching you' like a little surveillance on the side.

title: Petition to formally recognize open source work as civic service in Germany
author: PhilippGille
aiHeadline: Germany is considering recognizing open-source work as civic service, which is about as groundbreaking as finally giving credit to the people who invented the wheel.

title: Show HN: Glasses to detect smart-glasses that have cameras
author: nullpxl
aiHeadline: Introducing 'banrays,' the ultimate glasses to detect smart glasses with cameras, because who needs privacy when you can just look like a tech-savvy fashionista?

title: Credit report shows Meta keeping $27B off its books through advanced geometry
author: FreeQueso
aiHeadline: Meta's credit report reveals they've been hiding $27B using advanced geometry, proving that even in the digital age, magic still exists—but only for tech giants.
